医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
UQ临床研究寻求具有PTSD和复杂PTSD的参与者昆士兰州大学的研究人员正在寻找被诊断为PTSD和复杂PTSD的参与者进行的临床研究，旨在提高人们对其对大脑和整体福祉的影响的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/uq-clinical-study-seeks-participants-with-ptsd-ptsd-and-complex-ptsd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/uq-clinical-study-seeks-participants-with-ptsd-ptsd-and-complex-ptsd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e70E765C-63CB-4B4B-4B-87C7-6282955F370C Mon, 03 Mar 2025 20:22:04 -0500 UQ clinical study seeks participants with PTSD and complex PTSD
研究证实科学家表明，奶酪衍生的细菌，尤其是较少的菌株可以塑造肠道菌群并增强代谢功能，从而强调发酵食品对肠道健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/cheese-isnt-just-foode28094ite28099s-a-a-a-microbiome-boosterom-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-boosty-confirms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/cheese-isnt-just-foode28094ite28099s-a-a-a-microbiome-boosterom-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-booster-boosty-study-confirms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f211E3F-7B52-4927-A7AB-E56972E30CEC Mon, 03 Mar 2025 20:19:00 -0500 Cheese isn't just food—it’s a microbiome booster, study confirms
合成微生物组疗法为艰难梭菌感染提供了新的希望根据宾夕法尼亚州立大学的一组研究人员的说法，一种在小鼠中测试的合成微生物组疗法可预防肠道感染的严重症状，众所周知，该症状很难治疗，并可能在人类中威胁生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/synthetic-microbiome-therapy-mentaby-creders-new-hope-against-c-difficile-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/synthetic-microbiome-therapy-menter-therapy-offers-new-hope-against-c-difficile-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76920fdf-a46a-4f9d-bed0-249356fde655 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 20:17:01 -0500 Synthetic microbiome therapy offers new hope against C. difficile infections
研究阐明了细菌癌治疗背后的机制由中国科学院高级技术学院（CAS）的深圳先进技术学院和上海营养研究所的Xiao Yichuan教授的一名研究团队，CAS的健康和Xiao Yichuan教授阐明了使用基因研究的细菌菌株，从而阐明了细菌癌治疗背后的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-elucidates-mechanism-behind-bacterial-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/study-elucidates-mechanism-behind-bacterial-bacterial-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=868AD784-57B0-4E8B-A1B7-FADAFA48FAEE Mon, 03 Mar 2025 20:12:15 -0500 Study elucidates mechanism behind bacterial cancer therapy
突破性研究揭示了在卡路里限制期间维持新陈代谢的方法许多试图通过减少卡路里减肥的人熟悉这种令人沮丧的现实：在某些时候，身体停止了体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/breakthrough-research-uncover-uncovers-way-to-maint-meinat-metain-metabolism-during-during-calorie-restriction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/breakthrough-research-uncovers-way-way-to-to-maint-meinain-metabolism-during-during-calorie-calorie-restriction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcf71540-DC45-4981-A4BF-E9C9D48F586D Mon, 03 Mar 2025 20:06:04 -0500 Breakthrough research uncovers way to maintain metabolism during calorie restriction
新型的脂肪组织生物制造方法为增强皮肤再生铺平了道路用作内分泌器官的脂肪组织释放了调节其他受损组织（包括皮肤）的各种分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/novel-adipose-tissue-biofrication-biofrication-apphack-paves-paves-the-way-for------- for-enhanced-skin-regeneration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/novel-adipose-tissue-biofrication-biofrication-apphack-paves-paves-the-way-for------- for-enhanced-skin-regeneration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65A5A5D0E9-15C9-4A4C-85E5-C5657002D348 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 19:58:09 -0500 Novel adipose tissue biofabrication approach paves the way for enhanced skin regeneration
开创性研究揭示了DNA折叠如何指导精子细胞的发展两项新的地标性研究表明，似乎是如何将DNA的缠结缠结成一个结构，该结构是协调数千个基因形成精子细胞的结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/groundBreaking-Studies-sudies-reveal-how-dna-folding-guides-sperm-cell-cell-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/groundBreaking-Studies-reveal-how-dna-dna-folding-guides-sperm-cell-cell-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f13b18ea-38Da-40D1-9877-13d1536966ab1 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 19:48:52 -0500 Groundbreaking studies reveal how DNA folding guides sperm cell development
孕产妇的压力可能会破坏婴儿的肠道健康，研究突出了长期风险围产期孕产妇应力可能会改变母亲和婴儿的肠道菌群，从而增加与健康风险有关的炎症细菌。范围的评论强调了需要更好的压力测量和微生物组研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/maternal-stress-may-disrupt-infant-gut-gut-health-shealth-nealth-nealth-nealth-nealth-thighlightlights-long-term-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/maternal-stress-may-disrupt-infant-infant-gut-gut-health-nealth-nealth-nealth-nealth-nealth-nealth-highlightlights-long-term-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A1616300-45E3-40EA-9EEE-9EEE-04011C3697A8 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 19:46:00 -0500 Maternal stress may disrupt infant gut health, study highlights long-term risks
糖尿病性视网膜疾病患病率上升，而严重病例下降尽管自2014年以来，与糖尿病相关的眼病的患病率几乎翻了一番，但宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的一项研究人员领导的一项新研究实际上降低了这种疾病的最严重形式的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/diabetic-retinal-disease-prevalence-prevalence-rises-while-severe-cases-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/diabetic-retinal-disease-prevalence-prevalence-rises-while-severe-cases-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4756611-1DA1-4952-90B4-9797ED023868 Mon, 03 Mar 2025 12:33:20 -0500 Diabetic retinal disease prevalence rises while severe cases decline
USC研究阐明了全国纳洛酮的意识和使用一项由USC领导的新研究提供了有关谁知道，携带和使用纳洛酮来逆转致命阿片类药物过量的第一张图片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/usc-study-sheds-light-on-nation-nation-nation-nationwide-naloxone-naloxone-anoxone-avareness-and-saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250303/usc-study-sheds-light-on-nation-nationwide-nationwide-naloxone-naloxone-anoxone-atecon- and varenes-and-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c742e7a6-d316-41d4-8196-9b7a7aeafb6ad Mon, 03 Mar 2025 12:27:23 -0500 USC study sheds light on nationwide naloxone awareness and use
